title: Cheat Pharmicist’s Slow Life ~Making a Drug Store in Another World~ - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Cheats   Dense Protagonist   Game Elements   Loli   Magic   Male Protagonist   Naive Protagonist   Transported to Another World
author: Kennoji   ケンノジ
description:
Corporate slave Reiji went to another world one day, made one rank higher potions, and li~ghtly made a killer profit!

He used that money to open a drug store, and troubled people who heard the rumors came over…

Eyedrops for an elf troubled over his failing bow aim!

Cough syrup for the dragon that unintentionally releases his dragon breath!

Reiji makes medicine for troubled people, enjoying his leisurely slow life in a rural city.>
